statements: SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_id, interaction_id FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Moderate' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe' ORDER BY drug_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY drug_name HAVING interaction_count > 1 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC
SELECT patient_id, interaction_id FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name LIKE '%aspirin%' AND interaction_type = 'Moderate'
SELECT patient_id, interaction_id, drug_name FROM drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND interaction_type IN ('Severe', 'Moderate')
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY drug_name ASC
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions
SELECT interaction_description, drug_name FROM drug_interactions
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions
SELECT patient_id, reaction_date FROM adverse_reactions
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name LIKE '%acetaminophen%';
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE reaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT reaction_name, reaction_description FROM adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = 200;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM patients WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM patients INNER JOIN interactions ON patients.patient_id = interactions.patient_id
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM patients WHERE birth_date >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY birth_date DESC

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, reaction FROM patients JOIN interactions ON patients.patient_id = interactions.patient_id JOIN medications ON medications.medication_id = interactions.medication_id WHERE reaction IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM patients JOIN interactions ON patients.patient_id = interactions.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medication WHERE frequency = 3;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_description, interaction_date FROM DrugInteraction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medication WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, gender, address FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT interaction_description, interaction_date, patient_id FROM DrugInteraction WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 10 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_name, severity FROM DrugInteractions WHERE severity='High';
SELECT patient_id, reaction_name FROM AdverseReactions ORDER BY patient_id ASC, reaction_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM DrugInteractions WHERE severity = 'High';

SELECT Patients.name, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicationRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicationRecords.patient_id JOIN Medications ON MedicationRecords.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
